name: Court Lantern: Red Moon of Yore
description: A lantern with the emblem of Electro on it. These can be seen before Tenshukaku's gates.\nMany a craftsperson's life goal is to join the Shogunate's logistics division. After all, the chance to make any items for Her Excellency the Shogun is an unbelievably great honor! However, a certain grandmaster would find out after joining the division for real that most of the items within Tenshukaku have been there for several hundred years now, yet look good as new, requiring only regular maintenance as opposed to outright replacement.
